post_message: Los Angeles' top elected officials cosigned a letter  urge in the strongest possible terms that ICE immediately cease this practice in our city.  Since the late 1970s, L.A. police have worked to build trust within the city large immigrant community so those in the country illegally can report crimes and offer information to police without fear of deportation.
